data.name: GridViewBaseActualGroupSummaryItemTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a group summary item template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewScrollMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether per-pixel scrolling is enabled. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewCheckBoxFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of a field in a data source to which check boxes embedded into nodes are bound.

data.name: TableViewIndicatorWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the row indicator panel.

data.name: GridControlIsRecursiveExpand
data.value: Gets or sets whether child group rows at all nesting levels are automatically expanded when expanding their parent group row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCellRowHandle
data.value: Gets the handle of the row which owns the cell.

data.name: TableViewGroupColumnSummaryItemTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of group summary items aligned by columns. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewCommandsBestFitColumns
data.value: Adjusts the width of columns so that columns fit their contents in an optimal way.

data.name: TableViewAllowScrollHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether column headers are automatically scrolled once a user drags a column header to the View's left or right. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCommandsChangeCardExpanded
data.value: Toggles the specified card's expanded state.

data.name: GridControlActualGroupCount
data.value: Gets the actual number of grouping columns.

data.name: TableViewShowCriteriaInAutoFilterRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not to display the criteria selector buttons in the automatic filter row for all columns in the current table view.

data.name: TreeListViewShowAutoFilterRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Automatic Filter Row is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCommandsClearGrouping
data.value: Ungroups the grid.

data.name: TreeListViewAutoFilterRowData
data.value: Gets an object that is the Auto Filter Row's data.

data.name: TableViewRowStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to data rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewRootValue
data.value: Gets or sets the root value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowBandMultiRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not the grid displays each data record on a single row when using bands.

data.name: TableViewAllowCascadeUpdate
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not cascading data updates are allowed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GroupRowDataGroupValue
data.value: Gets or sets the group row's value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GroupRowDataGroupLevel
data.value: Gets a value that specifies at which nesting level the group row resides. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCellColumn
data.value: Gets the column which contains the cell.

data.name: GridViewBaseVisibleColumns
data.value: Gets the list of visible columns. This is a dependency property.

data.name: LookUpEditFilteredItems
data.value: Gets the collection of items that match the text typed by an end-user into the edit box.

data.name: TableViewAllowFixedGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether the top row for the visible group is always displayed as the user scrolls through grouped data. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewExtendScrollBarToFixedColumns
data.value: Specifies whether the horizontal scrollbar fills the entire width of the grid. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether to enable scroll animation. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to change a column's parent band. This is a dependency property.

data.value: Ungroups the grid.

data.name: GridGroupSummarySortInfoSummaryItem
data.value: Gets the summary item.

data.name: GridViewBaseGroupSummaryContentStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to group summary items. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewFocusedRowBorderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of a focused node's border. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GroupRowDataFixedNoneGroupSummaryData
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewActualCardRowTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a card row template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewFocusedRowBorderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of a focused row's border. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewAutoWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether column widths are automatically changed so that the total columns' width matches the grid's width. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridViewBaseGrid
data.value: Gets the grid which owns the current View.

data.name: TableViewAllowCellMerge
data.value: Gets or sets whether to enable the Cell Merging feature. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridGroupSummarySortInfoSortOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the order in which group rows are sorted.

data.name: TableViewPrintGroupFooterTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the Group Footer's presentation when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewCheckBoxValueConverter
data.value: Gets or sets a converter used to provide the checkbox value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewTotalSummaryFixedNoneContentWidth
data.value: This property supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: TableViewCommandsBestFitColumns
data.value: Adjusts the width of columns so that columns fit their contents in an optimal way.

data.name: CardViewPrintCardRowIndentTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of the indent around a row of grouped cards when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewFixedNoneContentWidth
data.value: Gets the width of the horizontally scrollable viewport. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewCardHeaderDisplayMemberBinding
data.value: Gets or sets the data binding for the card header.

data.name: TreeListViewImageFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the field in a data source that contains node images. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridViewBaseGroupFooterMenuCustomizations
data.value: Allows you to customize the Group Footer context menu by adding new menu items or removing existing items.

data.name: TableViewGroupColumnFooterElementStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to individual text elements in the group summary item that is displayed within the group footer. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridControlIsAsyncOperationInProgress
data.value: Gets whether or not data is being loaded in Instant Feedback UI Mode. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewHorizontalViewport
data.value: Gets the width of the view's client area.

data.name: TreeListNodeIteratorCurrent
data.value: Gets a node currently being processed by the TreeListNodeIterator object.

data.name: CardViewAllowCardResizing
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to change the width (or height) of cards. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewFixedRightContentWidth
data.value: Gets the right fixed content width. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewAutoWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether column widths are automatically changed so that the total columns' width matches the grid's width. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCommandsShowUnboundExpressionEditor
data.value: Invokes the Expression Editor.

data.name: TreeListViewPrintNodeImages
data.value: Gets or sets whether the node images are printed.

data.name: GridControlGroupCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of grouping columns.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowResizing
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can change column widths by dragging the edges of their headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowAdvancedHorizontalNavigation
data.value: Gets or sets whether advanced horizontal navigation is enabled.

data.name: TreeListControlView
data.value: Gets or sets the view. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewTotalSummaryFixedNoneContentWidth
data.value: This property supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: TreeListViewCommandsBestFitColumn
data.value: Resizes the column to the minimum width required to display the column's contents completely.

data.name: TreeListViewPrintColumnHeaderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to column headers when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewAutoPopulateServiceColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not columns are automatically created for service fields in the underlying data source. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewVisibleColumns
data.value: Gets the list of visible columns. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewPrintBandHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether band headers are printed.

data.name: TreeListViewCommandsExpandAllNodes
data.value: Expands all nodes.

data.name: CardViewPrintCardContentTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of individual values in the card values area when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewShowGroupFooters
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display group footers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridColumnIsGrouped
data.value: Gets whether a View is grouped by the values of this column. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowFixedColumnMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether menu items used to fix a column to the left or right, are shown within a column's context menu. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridViewBaseGroupPanelMenuCustomizations
data.value: Allows you to customize the Group Panel context menu by adding new menu items or removing existing items.

data.name: GridControlOptimizeSummaryCalculation
data.value: Specifies whether to optimize summary calculation. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewAllowHorizontalScrollingVirtualization
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether virtualization is enabled for horizontal scrolling.

data.name: TreeListViewRowDecorationTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the node decoration template. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowChangeBandParent
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to change the band's parent band. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewRowDecorationTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the row decoration template. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridViewBaseUseAnimationWhenExpanding
data.value: Gets or sets whether to play animation when expanding group rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCommandsMoveNextRow
data.value: Moves focus to the row or card following the one currently focused.

data.name: CardViewCardTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of cards. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridViewBaseGroupRowStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to group rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridGroupSummaryDataIsLast
data.value: Gets whether the group summary is the last visible summary (right most) displayed within a group row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListNodeIsExpanded
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not the node is expanded.

data.name: TreeListViewBestFitArea
data.value: Gets or sets which interface elements are taken into account when calculating optimal width for columns. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewBestFitMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the optimal width required for a column to completely display its contents is calculated. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewGroupFooterRowStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to group footers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewGroupFooterRowTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of group footer rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewPrintCardRowTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of card rows when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewPrintColumnHeaderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to column headers when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCommandsDeleteFocusedRow
data.value: Deletes the focused data row or card.

data.name: GridViewCommandsBaseCollapseAllGroups
data.value: Collapses all group rows.

data.name: TreeListViewPrintAllNodes
data.value: Gets or sets whether the grid is printed with all nodes expanded.

data.name: TreeListViewUseIndicatorForSelection
data.value: Gets or sets whether rows can be selected via the Row Indicator Panel. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewUseIndicatorForSelection
data.value: Gets or sets whether rows can be selected via the Row Indicator Panel.

data.name: GroupRowDataFixedLeftGroupSummaryData
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridGroupSummaryDataIsFirst
data.value: Gets whether the group summary is the first visible summary (left most) displayed within a group row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewNewItemRowData
data.value: Gets an object that represents the New Item Row's data.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowPerPixelScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets whether per-pixel scrolling is enabled. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewCardStyle
data.value: Gets or sets a card's style.

data.name: GridViewBaseGroupRowMenuCustomizations
data.value: Allows you to customize the Group Row context menu by adding new menu items or removing existing items.

data.name: TableViewIndicatorHeaderWidth
data.value: Gets the width of the row indicator header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewShowVerticalLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical lines are displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridControlView
data.value: Gets or sets the grid's view. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewDataRowTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of data rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridViewCommandsBaseMoveParentGroupRow
data.value: Moves focus to the group row that owns the currently focused row.

data.name: TreeListNodeImage
data.value: Gets or sets the node's image.

data.name: TreeListNodeNodes
data.value: Gets the collection of child nodes.

data.name: CardViewCardHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of card headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewMaxCardCountInRow
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of cards in a row (or column).

data.name: TreeListNodeLevel
data.value: Gets the node's nesting level.

data.name: TreeListViewParentFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the service field in a data source that contains parent node values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCommandsExpandAllGroups
data.value: Expands all group rows.

data.name: GroupRowDataGroupSummaryData
data.value: Gets the list of objects that contain information on group summaries displayed within a group row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridGroupSummaryDataText
data.value: Gets the summary text displayed within the group row.

data.name: TableViewAllowBandResizing
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can change band widths by dragging the edges of their headers.

data.name: TableViewAllowBestFit
data.value: Gets or sets whether it's allowed to calculate optimal widths, and apply them to all columns displayed within a View.

data.name: TableViewRowIndicatorContentTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of a row indicator's content. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListNodeVisibleParent
data.value: Gets the node's visible parent.

data.name: GridViewBaseGroupValueTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of column values displayed within group rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewTotalGroupAreaIndent
data.value: This property supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: TreeListViewRowIndicatorContentTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of a row indicator's content. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewFocusedCardBorderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of a focused card's border. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowScrollHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether column headers are automatically scrolled once a user drags a column header to the View's left or right. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewPrintMaximumCardColumns
data.value: Specifies the maximum number of card columns for printing/exporting. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewFixedLineWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the fixed line's width. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewRowMinHeight
data.value: Gets or sets a row's minimum height. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewPrintDetailTopIndent
data.value: Gets or sets the top print detail indent. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListNodeIsChecked
data.value: Gets or sets whether the node is checked.

data.name: TableViewScrollingVirtualizationMargin
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewNewItemRowPosition
data.value: Gets or sets the New Item Row's position within a View.

data.name: GridColumnGroupValueTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of column values displayed within group rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListControlBands
data.value: Provides access to the treelist's band collection.

data.name: TableViewAutoFilterRowData
data.value: Gets an object that represents the Auto Filter Row's data.

data.name: TableViewAutoMoveRowFocus
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether horizontal navigation keys move focus to the next/previous row when the current row's last/first cell is focused.

data.name: TableViewAllowAdvancedHorizontalNavigation
data.value: Gets or sets whether advanced horizontal navigation is enabled.

data.name: TreeListNodeParentNode
data.value: Gets the parent node.

data.name: TreeListNodeRowHandle
data.value: Gets the row handle that identifies the node.

data.name: TableViewPrintColumnHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether column headers are printed.

data.name: TreeListViewShowIndicator
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the Indicator panel is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridCommandsChangeGroupExpanded
data.value: Toggles the specified group row's expanded state.

data.name: GridViewBaseGridMenu
data.value: Gets the context menu currently being displayed within a View.

data.name: GridViewBaseIsGroupFooterMenuEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the group footer context menu is shown when an end-user right-clicks within the Group Footer. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewCardMargin
data.value: Gets or sets the outer margin of a card.

data.name: GridCommandsMoveFirstCell
data.value: Moves focus to the first cell displayed within the first visible row.

data.name: TableViewDataRowTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a data row template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewPrintCardHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template that defines the presentation of card headers when the grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowCascadeUpdate
data.value: Gets or sets whether or not cascading data updates are allowed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewCardLayout
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies how cards are arranged within a Card View.

data.name: TreeListViewExtendScrollBarToFixedColumns
data.value: Specifies whether the horizontal scrollbar fills the entire width of the treelist. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TableViewAutoFilterRowCellStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style applied to data cells displayed within the Auto Filter Row. This is a dependency property.

data.name: CardViewCardHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a card header template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: TreeListViewPrintAutoWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether printed columns' widths are automatically changed, so that the grid fits the width of the report page.

data.name: TreeListViewAllowAdvancedVerticalNavigation
data.value: Gets or sets whether advanced vertical navigation is enabled.

data.name: TableViewAllowResizing
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can change column widths by dragging the edges of their headers.

data.name: GridCommandsMovePrevRow
data.value: Moves focus to the row or card preceding the one currently focused.

data.name: TableViewAllowBandMoving
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to rearrange bands. This is a dependency property.

data.name: GridControlIsGrouped
data.value: Gets whether the grid's data is grouped.

data.name: GridCommandsClearFilter
data.value: Clears the grid's filter expression.
